Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: CounterandTimerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Event control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains Event control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains features related to defect pixel correction.
Category.Description: Category that contains features related to defect pixel correction.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: ColorTransformationControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.(Unit : Bps)

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

Enumeration.Name: BayerOrderPixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bayer Order Pixel Format.
Enumeration.Description: Bayer Order Pixel Format.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer RG.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer RG.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer GR.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer GR.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer GB.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer GB.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer BG.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer BG.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel linear memory.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel linear memory.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 10 bit per pixel linear memory.
EnumEntry.Description: 10 bit per pixel linear memory.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 12 bit per pixel linear memory.
EnumEntry.Description: 12 bit per pixel linear memory.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 10 bit per pixel linear memory.
EnumEntry.Description: 10 bit per pixel linear memory.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 12 bit per pixel linear memory.
EnumEntry.Description: 12 bit per pixel linear memory.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV422Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bit per pixel Bayer pattern.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

IntReg.Name: WidthMax
IntReg.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
IntReg.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.

IntReg.Name: HeightMax
IntReg.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
IntReg.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after flipping.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after flipping.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted (or latched) for a new frame.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger overlap is permitted.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

IntReg.Name: ExposureTimeRawReg
IntReg.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
IntReg.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Integer.Name: TransferDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay to apply after the image readout from sensor before transfer.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay to apply after the image readout from sensor before transfer. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: AcquisitionFrameRate Off
EnumEntry.Description: AcquisitionFrameRate off

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Partial Scan On
EnumEntry.Description: Partial Scan On

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: ResultingFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Resulting frame rate (in Hertz) that maximum allowed frame acquisition.
Float.Description: Resulting frame rate (in Hertz) that maximum allowed frame acquisition.

Integer.Name: AutoExposureTarget
Integer.ToolTip: When the auto exposure is "once" or "continuous", the the exposure time will be changed, depending on the target value.
Integer.Description: When the auto exposure is "once" or "continuous", the the exposure time will be changed, depending on the target value.

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeLowerLimit
Float.Description: The minimum exposure time abs of Auto Exposure. Not available in Digital gain mode. (Unit : us)

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeUpperLimit
Float.Description: The maximum exposure time abs of Auto Exposure. Not available in digital gain mode.(Unit : us)

Float.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
Float.Description: The minimum gain of Auto Gain. (Unit : dB)

Float.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
Float.Description: The maximum gain of Auto Gain. (Unit : dB)

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the invertion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: TimerActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen Timer is in active state.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen Timer is in active state.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Enumeration.Name: CounterSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Counter to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Counter to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: LineTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Line and Software Start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Line and Software Start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Exposure Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Exposure Start.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Exposure End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Exposure End.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Frame End.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Frame End.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureOverTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of Input triggers while Exposing.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of Input triggers while Exposing.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadoutOverTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts the number of the End of Expousre while Frame readout.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts the number of the End of Exposure while Frame readout.

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads the current value of the selected Counter. All Counters are reset after Acquisition Start.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Timer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the first Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the first Timer.

Float.Name: TimerDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.

Float.Name: TimerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.
Float.Description: Sets the duration of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Exposure Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Exposure Start.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Acquisition Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Acquisition Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: InternalVDStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Internal VD Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Internal VD Start.

EnumEntry.Name: PWCTriggerStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the PWC Trigger Start.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the PWC Trigger Start.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTransferStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just started the transfer of one or many Frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just started the transfer of one or many Frames.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTransferEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just completed the transfer of one or many Frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just completed the transfer of one or many Frames.

EnumEntry.Name: OverTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Overtriggering has occured.
EnumEntry.Description: Overtriggering has occured.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is disabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification is disabled.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification enabled.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features. Do not use both gain at the same time.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all digital channels or taps.(Black level will be applied with 14-bit image depth.)

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Integer.Name: GainRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Integer.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Float.Name: GainAbs
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected gain.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is manually controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is manually controlled using Gain.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Boolean.Name: GammaEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the Gamma Correction.
Boolean.Description: Activates the Gamma Correction. Gamma correction can not be used simultaneously with the LUT.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.

Boolean.Name: NoiseReductionEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Noise Reduction Filter.
Boolean.Description: Noise Reduction Filter.

Boolean.Name: DefectFilterEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Defect pixels are replaced into the neighboring pixels's average.
Boolean.Description: Enables or Disables the Defect Pixel Filter.

Enumeration.Name: DefectFilterTestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: DefectFilter Test Mode Select.
Enumeration.Description: Defect Filter Test Mode Select.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelReplaceCount
Integer.ToolTip: Defect Pixel Replace Count.
Integer.Description: Defect Pixel Replace Count.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Defect Pixel Index.
Integer.Description: Defect Pixel Index.

Integer.Name: DefectXCoordinate
Integer.ToolTip: Defect Pixel X Coordinate.
Integer.Description: Defect Pixel X Coordinate.

Integer.Name: DefectYCoordinate
Integer.ToolTip: Defect Pixel Y Coordinate.
Integer.Description: Defect Pixel Y Coordinate.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT. LUT can not be used simultaneously with the Gamma correction.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

IntReg.Name: LUTValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
IntReg.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.ToolTip: Accesses the entire content of the selected LUT in one chunk access

Boolean.Name: LowLatencyEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Minimize image transfer latency for fastest mode.
Boolean.Description: Minimize image transfer latency for fastest mode. This feature will be applied after camera reboot with storing in userset.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of the device registers.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of the device registers.
Boolean.DisplayName: Gev Device Mode Is Big Endian

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which physical network interface to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the network interface.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

EnumEntry.Name: UserDefinedName
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Userdefined name register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Userdefined name register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: SerialNumber
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Serial number register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Serial number register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: HeartbeatDisable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Heartbeat can be disabled
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Heartbeat can be disabled

EnumEntry.Name: LinkSpeed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Link Speed registers are supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Link Speed registers are supported

EnumEntry.Name: CCPApplicationSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the CCP Application Port and IP address registers are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the CCP Application Port and IP address registers are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: ManifestTable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Manifest Table is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Manifest Table is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: TestData
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the test packet is filled with data from the LFSR generator.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the test packet is filled with data from the LFSR generator.

EnumEntry.Name: DiscoveryAckDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: When Discovery ACK Delay register is supported, this bit indicates that the application can write it. If this bit is 0, the register is read-only.
EnumEntry.Description: When Discovery ACK Delay register is supported, this bit indicates that the application can write it. If this bit is 0, the register is read-only

EnumEntry.Name: DiscoveryAckDelayWritable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Discovery ACK Delay register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Discovery ACK Delay register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: ExtendedStatusCodes
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the generation of extended status codes is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the generation of extended status codes is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PrimaryApplicationSwitchover
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the authenticate primary application switchover requests are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the authenticate primary application switchover requests are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: Action
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if Actions are supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if ACTION_CMD and ACTION_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PendingAck
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the generation of PENDING_ACK is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the generation of PENDING_ACK is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: EventData
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: Event
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PacketResend
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: WriteMem
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: CommandsConcatenation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationLLA
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationDHCP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationPersistentIP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannelSourceSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates the SCSP register (stream channel source port) is available
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates the SCSP register (stream channel source port) is available

EnumEntry.Name: MessageChannelSourceSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates the MCSP register (message channel source port) is available
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates the MCSP register (message channel source port) is available

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel0BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream Channel0 Big And Little Endian

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file. This URL is an alternative if the application was unsuccessful to retrieve the device description file using the first URL.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Boolean.ToolTip: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.
Boolean.Description: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyValue
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Combines timestamp values to one value.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the first user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the first user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the second user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the second user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Third user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Third user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Boolean.Name: ColorTransformationEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationValueSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.

EnumEntry.Name: HUEBYGP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUEBYGP
EnumEntry.Description: HUEBYGP

EnumEntry.Name: HUEBYGN
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUEBYGN
EnumEntry.Description: HUEBYGN

EnumEntry.Name: HUEBYHP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUEBYHP
EnumEntry.Description: HUEBYHP

EnumEntry.Name: HUEBYHN
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUEBYHN
EnumEntry.Description: HUEBYHN

EnumEntry.Name: HUERYGP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUERYGP
EnumEntry.Description: HUERYGP

EnumEntry.Name: HUERYGN
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUERYGN
EnumEntry.Description: HUERYGN

EnumEntry.Name: HUERYHP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUERYHP
EnumEntry.Description: HUERYHP

EnumEntry.Name: HUERYHN
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUERYHN
EnumEntry.Description: HUERYHN

EnumEntry.Name: HUECG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: HUECG
EnumEntry.Description: HUECG

Float.Name: ColorTransformationValue
Float.ToolTip: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.
Float.Description: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.

Integer.Name: Locked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates that a node is always locked.

StructEntry.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSetReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Register containing the character set value

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevInterfaceBaseAddress
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Base address for interface registers of selected index.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PersistentIPEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Checks whether persistent IP is enabled.

IntReg.Name: GevBootstrapTimestampControlReg
IntReg.Description: 64-bit value indicating the number of timestamp clock tick in 1 second. This register holds the least significant bytes. Timestamp tick frequency is 0 if timestamp is not supported.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragmentReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register do not fragment.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacketReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register fire test packet.
